Metadata.Title: Deadly Waters Deluxe
Metadata.Description: Good day agent,There are 9 bottles of water on Dartmoor, you will need to poison them all...Granted you have done the work the ICA provides 3 consumed lethal poisons and a snoop inside the house could land you a 4th. You also might want to do some botany, the mansion hides some interesting machinery involving flowers and rat poisons.Good luck agent, I shall leave you to prepare...Created by : CybraxCyber (CybieC)
